text: Eadward kingc gret mine biscopes & mine eorles & ealle mine þegnas on Wigerccestresciren & on Gloucestrescire freondlice.

& ic kiþe eow þæt ic habbe gegifan Criste & Sancte Petre into Westminstre Perscoran & Deorhurst & eall æt þerto birð mid sace & mid socne, mid tolle & mid teame, on stræte & of stræte, on wuda & on felda & on eallan þingan swa full & swa forð swa hit me silfan on handa stod.
& ic nelle geþafian þæt þar anigne man ænigne onsting habbe buton se abbut & þa gebroðera to Seinte Petres neode.
